archimate:Device.name: High-Security Office Shredder (HSOS)
archimate:Device.documentation:
Intended Use:
• Departments: Administrative offices, HR, Finance, Procurement, Medical Records, Pharmacy, Legal, Security. • Purpose: Securely destroying sensitive hospital documents, financial records, patient information, and prescription labels to ensure data protection compliance and prevent unauthorized data recovery.
Specifications:
1. Shredding Capacity: • Minimum 15–30 sheets per pass (standard A4, letter, legal-sized documents). • Supports continuous duty cycle for high-volume shredding.
2. Security Level:
• P-5 or P-6 Security (for Highly Sensitive Data) – If handling extremely confidential patient records, consider P-6 (≤1mm x 10mm micro-cut) for near unrecoverable shredding. • Cut paper into ≤5mm particles to ensure compliance with healthcare data destruction standards.
3. Feed Type:
• Auto-feed and manual feed options to allow bulk shredding and on-demand single-page shredding.
4. Media Compatibility:
• Paper (A4, legal, letter) • Staples & Paper Clips: Can shred documents without removing staples or paper clips. • Credit Cards & ID Badges: slot for shredding expired hospital staff IDs. • CDs/DVDs: Dedicated slot for shredding old data discs.
5. Bin Capacity:
• Minimum 30–50 liters (8–13 gallons) to reduce frequent emptying. • Pull-out bin design for easy waste disposal. • Bag-compatible for collecting shredded waste securely.
6. Shredding Speed & Duty Cycle:
• Continuous-duty motor (for high-usage environments). • Auto-reverse & anti-jam technology to prevent paper jams. • Minimum speed: 5–7 feet per minute (fast shredding to reduce downtime). • Higher Speed (7+ feet per minute) – Faster shredding speeds reduce wait times in high-traffic hospital areas (e.g., records, finance).
7. Noise Level:
• ≤55 dB for quiet operation in hospital offices.
8. Safety & Security Features:
• Auto-stop when bin is full to prevent overloading. • Overheat protection (prevents overheating during long use). • Touch-sensitive safety shutoff to prevent accidental activation. • Lockable casters for easy movement and stability. • Dust Filtration System 9. Power Requirements: • 220–240V AC (50Hz) for compatibility with electrical system. • Energy-efficient, auto-sleep mode after inactivity.
